attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE WOULD JUST LIKE TO PETITION THE PRIME MINISTER AS TO WHY OUR CHILDREN DO NOT HAVE A CHOICE OF FOOD TO EAT IN OUR STATE SCHOOLS EXCEPT TO EAT HALAL MEAT WHICH IS AGAINST THE LAW IN THIS COUNTRY THE WAY THE ANIMALS ARE SLAUGHTERED. WHY DO WE HAVE TO BE CALLED RASCIST BECAUSE OF OUR BELEIFS ON ANIMAL WELFARE

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
